verses.verse: וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> way·yō·mer said ( The Ravens Feed Elijah) אֵלִיָּ֨הוּ <WH452> ’ê·lî·yā·hū Now Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֜י <WH8664> hat·tiš·bî the Tishbite, מִתֹּשָׁבֵ֣י <WH8453> mit·tō·šā·ḇê who was among the settlers גִלְעָד֮ <WH1568> ḡil·‘āḏ of Gilead, ( Or who was from Tishbe in Gilead) אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to אַחְאָב֒ <WH256> ’aḥ·’āḇ Ahab, חַי־ <WH2416> ḥay- lives — יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> Yah·weh “ As surely as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - עָמַ֣דְתִּי <WH5975> ‘ā·maḏ·tî I stand — לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·nāw before whom אִם־ <WH518> ’im- neither יִהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> yih·yeh there will be הַשָּׁנִ֥ים <WH8141> haš·šā·nîm years הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> hā·’êl·leh in these טַ֣ל <WH2919> ṭal dew וּמָטָ֑ר <WH4306> ū·mā·ṭār nor rain כִּ֖י <WH3588> kî except אִם־ <WH518> ’im- ... לְפִ֥י <WH6310> lə·p̄î at דְבָרִֽי׃ס <WH1697> ḏə·ḇā·rî my word! ”
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> way·hî came דְבַר־ <WH1697> ḏə·ḇar- Then a revelation יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh from the LORD אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> ’ê·lāw to [Elijah] לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> lê·mōr ...:

לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> lêḵ “ Leave מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> miz·zeh here, וּפָנִ֥יתָ <WH6437> ū·p̄ā·nî·ṯā turn לְּךָ֖ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) קֵ֑דְמָה 6924 Adv│3fs ( qê·ḏə·māh) eastward, וְנִסְתַּרְתָּ֙ 5641 Conj-w│V-Nifal-ConjPerf-2ms ( wə·nis·tar·tā) and hide yourself בְּנַ֣חַל 5158 Prep-b│N-msc ( bə·na·ḥal) by the Brook כְּרִ֔ית 3747 N-proper-fs ( kə·rîṯ) of Cherith, אֲשֶׁ֖ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) east of עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) ... פְּנֵ֥י 6440 N-cpc ( pə·nê) ... הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ 3383 Art│N-proper-fs ( hay·yar·dên) the Jordan.

וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> wə·hā·yāh And מֵהַנַּ֣חַל <WH5158> mê·han·na·ḥal from the brook, תִּשְׁתֶּ֑ה <WH8354> tiš·teh you are to drink וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - הָעֹרְבִ֣ים <WH6158> hā·‘ō·rə·ḇîm the ravens צִוִּ֔יתִי <WH6680> ṣiw·wî·ṯî and I have commanded לְכַלְכֶּלְךָ֖ <WH3557> lə·ḵal·kel·ḵā to feed you שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> šām there. ”

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> way·yê·leḵ and he went וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> way·ya·‘aś So [Elijah] did כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> kiḏ·ḇar had told him, יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh what the LORD וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> way·yê·leḵ ... וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> way·yê·šeḇ and lived בְּנַ֣חַל <WH5158> bə·na·ḥal by the Brook כְּרִ֔ית <WH3747> kə·rîṯ of Cherith, אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ’ă·šer east of עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- ... פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pə·nê ... הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> hay·yar·dên the Jordan.

וְהָעֹרְבִ֗ים <WH6158> wə·hā·‘ō·rə·ḇîm The ravens מְבִיאִ֨ים <WH935> mə·ḇî·’îm would bring ל֜וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) him לֶ֤חֶם 3899 N-ms ( le·ḥem) bread וּבָשָׂר֙ 1320 Conj-w│N-ms ( ū·ḇā·śār) and meat בַּבֹּ֔קֶר 1242 Prep-b, Art│N-ms ( bab·bō·qer) in the morning וְלֶ֥חֶם 3899 Conj-w│N-ms ( wə·le·ḥem) ... וּבָשָׂ֖ר 1320 Conj-w│N-ms ( ū·ḇā·śār) ... בָּעָ֑רֶב 6153 Prep-b, Art│N-ms ( bā·‘ā·reḇ) and evening, וּמִן־ 4480 Conj-w│Prep ( ū·min-) from הַנַּ֖חַל 5158 Art│N-ms ( han·na·ḥal) the brook. יִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ 8354 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yiš·teh) and he would drink

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> way·hî Some time later, however מִקֵּ֥ץ <WH7093> miq·qêṣ ... יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> yā·mîm ..., וַיִּיבַ֣שׁ <WH3001> way·yî·ḇaš dried up הַנָּ֑חַל <WH5158> han·nā·ḥal the brook כִּ֛י <WH3588> kî because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- no הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> hā·yāh there had been גֶ֖שֶׁם <WH1653> ḡe·šem rain בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ס <WH776> bā·’ā·reṣ in the land.
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> way·hî came ( The Widow of Zarephath) דְבַר־ <WH1697> ḏə·ḇar- Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> ’ê·lāw to [Elijah] לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> lê·mōr ...:

ק֣וּם <WH6965> qūm “ Get up לֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> lêḵ [and] go צָרְפַ֙תָה֙ <WH6886> ṣā·rə·p̄a·ṯāh to Zarephath אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - לְצִיד֔וֹן <WH6721> lə·ṣî·ḏō·wn of Sidon, וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֖ <WH3427> wə·yā·šaḇ·tā and stay שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> šām there. הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> hin·nêh Behold, צִוִּ֥יתִי <WH6680> ṣiw·wî·ṯî I have commanded שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> šām there אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> ’iš·šāh vvv אַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> ’al·mā·nāh a widow לְכַלְכְּלֶֽךָ׃ <WH3557> lə·ḵal·kə·le·ḵā to provide for you. ”

וַיָּ֣קָם׀ <WH6965> way·yā·qām So Elijah got up וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> way·yê·leḵ and went צָרְפַ֗תָה <WH6886> ṣā·rə·p̄a·ṯāh to Zarephath. וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> way·yā·ḇō When he arrived אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- at פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> pe·ṯaḥ gate, הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> hā·‘îr the city וְהִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> wə·hin·nêh- ... שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> šām there אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> ’iš·šāh ... אַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> ’al·mā·nāh was a widow מְקֹשֶׁ֣שֶׁת <WH7197> mə·qō·še·šeṯ gathering עֵצִ֑ים <WH6086> ‘ê·ṣîm sticks. וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā Elijah called אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> ’ê·le·hā to her וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> way·yō·mar and said, קְחִי־ <WH3947> qə·ḥî- bring נָ֨א <WH4994> nā “ Please לִ֧י Prep│1cs ( lî) me מְעַט־ 4592 Adj-msc ( mə·‘aṭ-) a little מַ֛יִם 4325 N-mp ( ma·yim) water בַּכְּלִ֖י 3627 Prep-b, Art│N-ms ( bak·kə·lî) in a cup, וְאֶשְׁתֶּֽה׃ 8354 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjImperf. h-1cs ( wə·’eš·teh) so that I may drink. ”

וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> wat·tê·leḵ And as she was going לָקַ֑חַת <WH3947> lā·qa·ḥaṯ to get [it], וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā he called אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> ’ê·le·hā to her וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> way·yō·mar and said, לִֽקְחִי־ <WH3947> liq·ḥî- bring נָ֥א <WH4994> nā “ Please לִ֛י Prep│1cs ( lî) me פַּת־ 6595 N-fsc ( paṯ-) a piece לֶ֖חֶם 3899 N-ms ( le·ḥem) of bread בְּיָדֵֽךְ׃ 3027 Prep-b│N-fsc│2fs ( bə·yā·ḏêḵ) -. ”

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> wat·tō·mer But she replied, חַי־ <WH2416> ḥay- lives, יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah·weh “ As surely as the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·he·ḵā your God אִם־ <WH518> ’im- no יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yeš- have לִ֣י Prep│1cs ( lî) I מָע֔וֹג 4580 N-ms ( mā·‘ō·wḡ) bread — כִּ֣י 3588 Conj ( kî) only אִם־ 518 Conj ( ’im-) ... מְלֹ֤א 4393 N-msc ( mə·lō) a handful כַף־ 3709 N-fsc ( ḵap̄-) ... קֶ֙מַח֙ 7058 N-ms ( qe·maḥ) of flour בַּכַּ֔ד 3537 Prep-b, Art│N-fs ( bak·kaḏ) in a jar וּמְעַט־ 4592 Conj-w│Adj-msc ( ū·mə·‘aṭ-) and a little שֶׁ֖מֶן 8081 N-ms ( še·men) oil בַּצַּפָּ֑חַת 6835 Prep-b, Art│N-fs ( baṣ·ṣap·pā·ḥaṯ) in a jug. וְהִנְנִ֨י 2005 Conj-w│Interjection│1cs ( wə·hin·nî) Look, מְקֹשֶׁ֜שֶׁת 7197 V-Piel-Prtcpl-fs ( mə·qō·še·šeṯ) I am gathering שְׁנַ֣יִם 8147 Number-md ( šə·na·yim) a couple of עֵצִ֗ים 6086 N-mp ( ‘ê·ṣîm) sticks וּבָ֙אתִי֙ 935 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-1cs ( ū·ḇā·ṯî) to take home וַעֲשִׂיתִ֙יהוּ֙ 6213 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-1cs│3ms ( wa·‘ă·śî·ṯî·hū) and prepare [a meal] לִ֣י Prep│1cs ( lî) for myself וְלִבְנִ֔י 1121 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-msc│1cs ( wə·liḇ·nî) and my son, וַאֲכַלְנֻ֖הוּ 398 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-1cp│3ms ( wa·’ă·ḵal·nu·hū) so that we may eat it וָמָֽתְנוּ׃ 4191 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-1cp ( wā·mā·ṯə·nū) and die. ”

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said אֵלֶ֤יהָ <WH413> ’ê·le·hā to her. אֵלִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH452> ’ê·lî·yā·hū Elijah אַל־ <WH408> ’al- “ Do not תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <WH3372> tî·rə·’î be afraid, ” בֹּ֖אִי <WH935> bō·’î “ Go עֲשִׂ֣י <WH6213> ‘ă·śî and do כִדְבָרֵ֑ךְ <WH1697> ḵiḏ·ḇā·rêḵ as you have said. אַ֣ךְ <WH389> ’aḵ But עֲשִׂי־ <WH6213> ‘ă·śî- make לִ֣י Prep│1cs ( lî) me מִ֠שָּׁם 8033 Prep-m│Adv ( miš·šām) from [what you have], עֻגָ֨ה 5692 N-fs ( ‘u·ḡāh) cake of bread קְטַנָּ֤ה 6996 Adj-fs ( qə·ṭan·nāh) a small בָרִאשֹׁנָה֙ 7223 Prep-b, Art│Adj-fs ( ḇā·ri·šō·nāh) first וְהוֹצֵ֣אתְ 3318 Conj-w│V-Hifil-ConjPerf-2fs ( wə·hō·ṣēṯ) and bring it out לִ֔י Prep│1cs ( lî) to me. וְלָ֣ךְ Conj-w│Prep│2fs ( wə·lāḵ) for yourself וְלִבְנֵ֔ךְ 1121 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-msc│2fs ( wə·liḇ·nêḵ) and your son, תַּעֲשִׂ֖י 6213 V-Qal-Imperf-2fs ( ta·‘ă·śî) make [some] בָּאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ס 314 Prep-b, Art│Adj-fs ( bā·’a·ḥă·rō·nāh) Afterward,

כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî for כֹה֩ <WH3541> ḵōh this is what אָמַ֨ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel, כַּ֤ד <WH3537> kaḏ ‘ The jar הַקֶּ֙מַח֙ <WH7058> haq·qe·maḥ of flour לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō will not תִכְלָ֔ה <WH3615> ṯiḵ·lāh be exhausted וְצַפַּ֥חַת <WH6835> wə·ṣap·pa·ḥaṯ and the jug הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> haš·še·men of oil לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō will not תֶחְסָ֑ר <WH2637> ṯeḥ·sār run dry עַ֠ד <WH5704> ‘aḏ until י֧וֹם <WH3117> yō·wm the day תִּתֶּן <WH5414> tit·tɛn sends יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> ha·šêm the LORD גֶּ֖שֶׁם <WH1653> ge·šem rain עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- upon פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pə·nê the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> hā·’ă·ḏā·māh of the earth. ’”

וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> wat·tê·leḵ So she went וַתַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> wat·ta·‘ă·śeh and did כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> kiḏ·ḇar according to the word אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <WH452> ’ê·lî·yā·hū of Elijah, וַתֹּ֧אכַל <WH398> wat·tō·ḵal and there was food הוּא־ <WH1931> hū- and the woman וָהִיא <WH1931> wå̄·hī for Elijah וּבֵיתָ֖הּ <WH1004> ū·ḇê·ṯāh and her household. יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> yā·mîm every day
